dict.acceptation: 给…作演讲；教训（通常是长篇大论的）；

sent.orig: She toured the country, giving lecture after lecture.
sent.trans: 她周游全国，不断地举行讲座。

sent.orig: Professor Pearson gave the inaugural lecture in the new lecture theatre.
sent.trans: 皮尔逊教授在新的阶梯讲堂发表了启用演说。

sent.orig: Audio of most lecture sessions, in addition downloadable lecture notes, are available for this course.
sent.trans: 除了可以下载的课堂笔记之外，这门课程也提供了大部分课堂的录音材料。

sent.orig: This course features selected lecture notes associated with lecture content and readings.
sent.trans: 本课程以课堂讲稿结合授课内容及延伸阅读为特色。

sent.orig: The students are attending a lecture in the lecture theatre.
sent.trans: 学生们正在阶梯教室里听讲演。
